amendment.description: To provide for flood prevention in the State of Louisiana, with an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3728 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3728 proposed by Senator Vitter. (consideration: CR S3955-3957; text: CR S3955; text as modified: CR S3955-3956) To provide for flood prevention in the State of Louisiana, with an offset.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3728 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3728 proposed by Senator Vitter.
